poemsDataJson.list_full: 逢(あ)ふことの 絶(た)えてしなくは なかなかに 人(ひと)をも身(み)をも 恨(うら)みざらまし
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: If it should happen//That we never met again,//I would not complain;//And I doubt that she or I//Would feel that we were left alone.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Ōkoto no|Taete shi nakuba|Nakanaka ni|Hito o mo mi o mo|Urami zara mashi
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ひとをもみをも うらみさらまし
poemsDataJson.author: 中納言朝忠(ちゅうなごんあさただ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 逢ってかえってつれなくなった相手を恨む苦しみ
